content: christmas tree hairclip free pattern by trang le - @irish_klb materials -yarn size 2 2-3 colors -hook size 2 25/2 5 mm -scissors -tapestry needle -metal hairclip 6cm -several pieces of felt measuring 6cm x 2cm -glue gun abbreviations us crochet terms -chain chain -st/sts stitch/stitches -single_crochet single_crochet -decrease single_crochet two together -sc3tog single_crochet three together -treble_crochet treble_crochet -slip_stitch slip_stitch -fo fasten_off instruction body of the tree row 1 make chain 8 single_crochet in to the second chain sc6 turn 7sts row 2 - 4 chain sc7 turn 7sts row 5 chain decrease sc3 sg2tog turn 5sts row 6 - 8 chain sc5 turn 5sts row 9 chain decrease single_crochet sg2tog turn 3sts row 10 - 12 chain sc3 turn 3sts row 13 chain sc3tog do not turn 1st row 14 chain single_crochet in every row until row 1 single_crochet chain single_crochet in the same st sc5 single_crochet chain single_crochet single_crochet until the top of the tree slip_stitch fo tree stump change to brown color insert your hook at the third st make 3ch 1tr in the same place tr2 chain 3 slip_stitch in the same place of the last treble_crochet fo border change to white color or any color you like insert hook at the next st where you just fo ch3 skip 1st single_crochet repeat until you reach the tree stump in other side fo decoration use your hook or tapestry needle to decorate your christmas tree here are some sample decorations for your inspiration finish cut a 6-centimeter strip of felt make a small slit in the felt to attach the hair clip then use a glue gun to attach your christmas tree to the hair clip be sure to hide all yarn ends and be careful of the hot glue share your beautiful christmas tree hairclip by tagging me at @irish_klb and using the hashtag #crochetchristmastreehairclip happy crocheting this pattern is for private use only and may not be copied resold or distributed for pattern support please email me irishle1712@gmail com
